text:
e="preserve">Madina Nalwanga (born in 2000) became famous for her lead role in Disney's Queen of Katwe. The film depicts the life of Phiona Mutesi, a Ugandan girl living in a slum in Katwe. For her role in the film, she won most promising actor award at 2017 Africa Movie Academy Awards in Lagos, Nigeria.
Early life.
Born in the poor Kampala's slum of Katwe, she spent their childhood selling corn on the streets of Katwe.
